title: ♥ Creating an NZ based (bronze 1 - Silver 1) Dynamic que team thing ♥
body:
Hi guys ♥

I am a bronze 1 player and have been playing since mid S4. Straight after hitting Level 30, I started playing ranked and got placed in bronze V but managed to climb to bronze 1 in about a week. Last season I made it up to silver 2, then tilted back down to silver 5 in the weeks before season end. During preseason I made it back to silver 2 again, and recently finished my ranked placements (going 2/8) and ending up in bronze 1 again. I played super poorly during my placements and am working hard to get my tilt under control and am starting to improve already :D I am moving house on the 16th of this month, and will only be able to play during the day on weekdays until then.

This season I am maining ADC, so am looking for a support, top lane, mid lane and jungler to join me on this journey and become friends so we don't have to face the toxin of dynamic que alone. 

Basically to apply leave these details below:

* Do you live in NZ? - this is a must
* Age - Highly pref people 20+
* Vague availability
* Current rank (and highest)
* Preferred role + champs for that role (none of this "i play all lanes equally well")
* Skype, CV, TS (what do you prefer)

**_DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE TOXIC OR RAGEY_**

replies.body:
Do you live in NZ? Yes
Age-15....
Vague availability-anywhere on weekends
Current rank- Gold 5
preferred role + champs for that role: Jungle, support, top 
only got skype...

Do you live in NZ? Yes
Age - 28
Vague availability- Most Afternoons/evenings
Current rank- Doing placements after 6 month break was b3-s3 previous seasons
Preferred role + champs for that role: I would like to play any lanes in order to upskill. Previous seasons, Jungle or Support.
Skype, CV, TS: Have all, prefer TS or Mumble or Vent

IGN: Yeah Gnar Aye
I've played with you a few times before but I don't live in NZ
